detail_desc: Calf-length dress in patterned satin with an elasticated seam with a drawstring under the bust and at the waist and a concealed zip at the back. Long raglan sleeves with a seam and elastic drawstring at the cuffs and a wide, tiered skirt with decorative gathers. Unlined.

Boiler suit in washed, organic cotton denim with short sleeves, a collar and press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets, side pockets, back pockets and a detachable belt with a metal buckle at the waist. Wide, ankle-length legs.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot. Satin insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Tights in a soft, textured knit with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a shimmering finish, ears on the top and a wide turned-up hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a boat neck and 3/4-length sleeves.
Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves with frills at the front, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and a low crotch.

Pyjamas in a soft, patterned viscose weave. Strappy top in a double layer at the top with adjustable shoulder straps, an opening at the front with a tie over the bust and a seam below the bust with a flared flounce. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist and short slits at the sides of the hem.
Joggers in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and side pockets. Relaxed fit with tapered legs and ribbed hems.
Tube scarf in a soft jacquard knit.
Metal watch with an adjustable strap in nylon with a metal buckle. Width of strap 2 cm, total length 24.5 cm. Diameter of watch 3.5 cm.
Short, straight-cut dress in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in soft, fine-knit organic cotton, with a wide frill at the top front and back. Rib-knit straps that fasten at the back, and ribbing at the top and hems.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal chain bracelets in various designs.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned fleece that fasten down the front and along one leg. Ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif, faceted plastic beads and studs on the front, and a raw-edge hem.

Straight-cut shirt in sturdy cotton corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and an open chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.
Chinos in cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and button, and fake pockets.
Cardboard glasses in various sizes and designs.
Short-sleeved sports top with a print motif. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, short dolman sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a gently rounded hem. Wide fit, longer at the back.
Lightweight, padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets. Narrow elastication around the hood and cuffs.
Short dress woven in a crisp cotton blend with 3/4-length dolman sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Top in soft cotton jersey with decorative buttons at the front and an elasticated hem.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with an elasticated rib-knit drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Cotton corduroy jacket with metal buttons, a pile-lined collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets, side pockets and buttoned cuffs.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Leggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and flared legs.
Double-layered hat in printed jersey.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short-sleeved top in ribbed organic cotton jersey with an overlocked edge at the cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and legs with sequins on the knees, decorative stitching and narrow hems.

Sleeveless, ankle-length jumpsuit in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover top and seam with a sewn-in tie belt at the waist. Concealed zip and at the back, concealed pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs. Lined at the top.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.
Short top in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-shaped neckline with decorative buttons down the front, and smocking at the back.

Fitted, sleeveless top in woven fabric with a square neckline and elasticated, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps. Cut-out section with wide ties at the back, a seam with a peplum at the waist and elastication at the back. Cotton weave lining.
Blouse in a linen weave with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Off-the-shoulder jumpsuit in a patterned crêpe weave with elastication at the top and short flounced sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and long, straight legs.

Long dress in airy georgette made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a tiered skirt for added volume and soft draping. Lined in chiffon made from recycled polyester.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey with a text print on the front. Opening with press-studs at one side and press-studs at the crotch.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and side pockets. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Wide pyjama bottoms in an airy, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and wide, straight legs.

Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck at the front, deep V-neck at the back and wide shoulder straps that cross at the back. Cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, high-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a contrasting colour section and an embroidered text motif on the front. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with decorative studs, a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, a welt back pocket and tapered legs with creases.
Metal hair clips, four patterned, two glittery and four in a solid colour. Size 4 cm.
Metal hoop earrings with pearly plastic beads. Length 4.5 cm.

Jacket in washed denim with metal buttons, a faux shearling-lined collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and button at the sides. Faux shearling lining.
Short dress in a sturdy weave with short puff sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. Fitted bodice and bell-shaped skirt.
Trainer sandals in cotton canvas with a hook and loop strap over the feet. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) toe caps and soles.
Hair elastics decorated with faux fur pompoms.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a silicone print on the front, jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a decorative back pocket. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with flatlock seams. Short raglan sleeves and twisted side seams.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch (not in sizes 9M-4Y) and ribbed hems.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with reflective details and a detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, flap patch pockets with a press-stud, and elasticated cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.
Briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Boots in imitation leather and imitation suede with lacing. Faux fur linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 3 cm.
Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, a zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Trousers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Derby shoes with open lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Short, sleeveless A-line dress in woven fabric with a round neckline, pleats at the top to create soft draping and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.

Ankle-length jeggings in washed, stretch denim with worn details. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems. Push up – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.
Trainers in mesh with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Two-button jacket in a textured cotton weave with a chest pocket and flap welt pockets at the front. Contrasting colour elbow patches, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Sleeveless dresses in soft cotton jersey with a seam at the top and a gathered, gently flared skirt.
